mapper.select: SELECT s.survey_id, s.survey_name, ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (s.survey_id = 1002 AND total_score <= 15) OR (s.survey_id = 1003 AND total_score >= 22) OR (s.survey_id = 1004 AND total_score >= 21) OR (s.survey_id = 1005 AND total_score >= 15) OR (s.survey_id = 1006 AND total_score >= 25) OR (s.survey_id = 1007 AND total_score >= 16) OR (s.survey_id = 1008 AND total_score >= 40) OR (s.survey_id = 1009 AND total_score >= 27) OR (s.survey_id = 1010 AND total_score <= 20) ) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / COUNT(*)) * 100, 2) AS highRiskRate FROM ( SELECT survey_id, client_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM survey_feedback GROUP BY survey_id, client_id ) t JOIN survey s ON t.survey_id = s.survey_id GROUP BY s.survey_id, s.survey_name

SELECT symptom_name, ROUND(AVG(score), 2) AS avgScore FROM ( SELECT '우울' AS symptom_name, AVG(f.score) AS score FROM survey_feedback f JOIN client c ON f.client_id = c.client_id WHERE c.interest LIKE '%우울%' AND f.survey_id = 1004 GROUP BY f.client_id
UNION ALL
